name: Strange Case
description:
Your car breaks down and now you have choice but to go into a strange, nearby village for help. Something sinister is happening there: should you investigate or figure out how to make your way out?

CONTROLS

  • Flashlight toggle - Right-click
  • Moving Up - W
  • Moving Down - S
  • Moving left - A
  • Moving right - D
  • Run - Shift + Directional key
  • Sneaking - Space

*If you are having problems with run speed we recommend you try the .exe file for a much better runtime;  html does not handle light drawing well.
